title: Bitcoin Price Dips Below $21,000 as Crypto Firms Announce Layoffs
sub_head: Crypto market value falls under $1 trillion from $3 trillion high last November
body:
The price of bitcoin continued to fall Tuesday as the crypto industry struggles with fallout from the extended selloff.
Bitcoin traded as low as $20,834 earlier on Tuesday, according to CoinDesk. The original cryptocurrency hasnâ€™t traded under $20,000 since December 2020.
